summary: The diff implements a Motoko-based finder trust/credit score system. Most requirements are addressed: finder profiles in a 'finders' map, credit score incremented on claim approval, items sorted by credit score, getFinders endpoint, and frontend badge display. However, there are notable deviations from the spec: badge tier thresholds differ from requirements, a Platinum tier is added (not requested), and the backend returns plain Item arrays rather than attaching finder_credit_score/finder_badge fields to the item payload as specified in REQ-15.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include finder_credit_score (int) and finder_badge (string) fields attached to each found item in the GET /items response payload, so the frontend can render the badge without a separate fetch.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend's getItemsWithFinder returns [Item] (plain Item array) rather than a composite type with finder_credit_score and finder_badge embedded in each item record. The ItemWithFinder type exists internally but is not exposed as the return type; the frontend resolves credit scores separately via a FinderMap from a parallel getFinders call, not from fields embedded in the item payload.

hallucinated_features.description: A Platinum badge tier (100+ pts) was added, which was not requested. The spec only defines Bronze (0-20), Silver (21-50), and Gold (51+).
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirements specify exactly three tiers. The implementation introduces a fourth Platinum tier at 100+ pts.

hallucinated_features.description: Badge tier thresholds differ from the specification. The implementation uses Bronze <20, Silver 20-49, Gold 50-99 (and Platinum 100+), whereas the spec requires Bronze 0-20, Silver 21-50, Gold 51+.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 specifies Bronze 0-20, Silver 21-50, Gold 51+. The getFinderBadge function uses >=20 for Silver and >=50 for Gold, shifting boundaries by 1.

hallucinated_features.description: A TrustScoreLegend UI component was added to the main app page above the item grid, which was not requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asked for a legend or key explaining badge tiers on the main page.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration.mo module was added to handle schema migration for the finders map.
hallucinated_features.reason: The requirements do not mention a migration module; this is an implementation detail added beyond what was specified.
